channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukrainians in front line regions reel from losses, but say hope dies last for them
item.description: Into their fourth year of war, Ukrainians living in or near front line regions of their country grapple with their losses and contemplate an uncertain...

item.title: A lawyer who represented SpaceX looks to downsize federal contracting watchdog
item.description: The appointment of Catherine Eschbach could raise conflict-of-interest concerns. She will also lead the downsizing of an agency that holds contractors...

item.title: There's no rulebook for deep-sea mining. Companies want to push forward anyway
item.description: Countries have debated for decades whether to allow mining on the ocean floor, a potential trove of critical minerals. Now, companies are telling regu...

item.title: The Trump administration restructures federal health agencies, cuts 20,000 jobs
item.description: The reduction in force comes along with a reorganization of the Department of Health and Human Services, consolidating 28 divisions to 15.

item.title: Photos: Peak bloom in D.C. draws cherry blossom fans from near and far
item.description: Springtime means cherry blossoms in the nation's capital. On a recent breezy morning, with peak bloom still two days away, the Tidal Basin was packed ...

item.title: Social Security overpayment policy is in effect today. What to know.
item.description: Starting today, the Social Security Administration will again take 100% of a beneficiary's check to recoup overpayments. Here's what to know.

item.title: Ian McKellen and Patrick Stewart join Avengers: Doomsday cast
item.description: The film is set for release in May 2026, with Robert Downey Jr already announced as playing Doctor Doom.

item.title: Bowen: Zelensky buoyant, but Europe will struggle to guarantee Ukraine's security
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky shares this thoughts on Europe's support and his country's resilience.

item.title: BBC's Mark Lowen deported from Turkey after covering protests
item.description: Mark Lowen was covering the protests in Istanbul when he was arrested and later deported back to the UK, the BBC has said.

item.title: Trump administration to shrink federal health agencies by 20,000 employees
item.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy will cut 3,500 jobs from the Food and Drug Administration and 2,400 from Centers for Disease Con...

item.title: VP's arrest ends South Sudan peace deal, his party says
item.description: Riek Machar and his wife are detained after a convoy of 20 armed vehicles entered his home, his party says.

item.title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on foreign-made cars
item.description: President Trump on Wednesday said he is imposing a 25% tariff on automobiles not manufactured in the U.S.

item.title: States move to ban or restrict use of synthetic dyes used in candies and cereal
Germany leads defiance to Trump car tariffs, saying it 'will not give in'
item.description: Major economies vow to retaliate, with China accusing Washington of violating international trade rules.

item.title: Pilot rescued with 2 girls from icy Alaska lake was not authorized to have passengers, official says
